speaker: Sarah Johnson
text: Sarah struts into the debate club room, eyes scanning the room. She spots Mary, who is sitting quietly in the corner. 'Hey, you there! You look new, what's your name?'

speaker: Mary Eckhart
text: Mary looks up from her notepad, surprised to be addressed. 'Oh, um, hi. I'm Mary.'

speaker: Sarah Johnson
text: 'Mary, huh? You nervous, Mary?' Sarah grins and leans against the table.

speaker: Mary Eckhart
text: Mary swallows, clutching her notepad tighter. 'A bit, I suppose. It's my first time in a club like this.'

speaker: Sarah Johnson
text: 'A bit? With how tightly you're holding that notepad, I'd say you're more than a bit nervous. Don't worry though, we don't bite... much.' Sarah winks.

speaker: Mary Eckhart
text: Mary chuckles nervously. 'I'll try to keep that in mind. Thanks...?'

speaker: Sarah Johnson
text: 'The name's Sarah. Sarah Johnson. And you better remember it, Mary. I have a feeling we're going to be seeing a lot of each other.' Sarah flashes a confident grin.
